sources.title: Harm's Way | Full Movie | Intense Thriller | Kathleen Quinlan
sources.description:
Harm's Way - Darlene and her daughter Victoria seek refuge at a remote rural safe house for abused women that's run by the strict and tough, but folksy and supportive Bea. Things turn sour when Bea proves to be a total lunatic with an especially dangerous influence on the impressionable Victoria.
2008.  Stars: Kathleen Quinlan, Ingrid Kavelaars, Hannah Lochner
